"A.D.2028/4/23/13:30": "Huhah... Hahahahahahahahaha! Well done, magnificent job defeating me!"
"My will that serves Mother, and your will that wants to stop Mother... If this is the result of a full on battle, I have no regrets."
"...Aratron. Why would you go so far for Mother?"
"This has nothing to do with right or wrong, Kohri Washinomiya. This is simply what my heart tells me to do."
"I met Mother, and I saw the world change. Walking alongside Mother, I simply wanted to see the world Mother would create. That's all."
"My old heart, withered and worn, was warmed by meeting Mother. If I don't follow my heart, what should I follow?"
"Young lady... Hitsugi Yasaka, was it? You've found it as well, right? How your heart has it's desires."
"Hoho, those are some determined eyes."
"If your heart wants to confront Mother, then follow it and try to destroy her."
"Fufill your desires... That's what it means to be alive."
"Isn't that right, <%me>? A warrior of the battlefield such as yourself surely understands, yes?"
"ESCA Darkers... This number... where did they-"
"Mother isn't able to hold them all back. Because this place is full of Ether, they just keep appearing. Good grief."
"Aratron?"
"I lost. You won. Therefore, you will keep going. And I will stay here. That's that."
"There's no need for questions, Kohri Washinomiya. Move forward and don't look back. Just keep moving forward."
"Look back only when you have finished. Once you've reached the end of the road, only then are you allowed to look back."
"...Let's go. Don't let this old man's sacrifice be in vain."
"Let's go. Keep moving. Forward. Otherwise, you'll get left behind..."

"ほほ。果てたと思いし道の続きは
さながら夢のよう……とはよく言ったもの。
とてもとても、心地の良い道であった。"

"そして、良き道の果てであった。
まばゆく、鮮烈で……荒々しく、美しい。
あれこそが、未来というものよ。"

"良きかな……良きかな……
最後に、良いものを見せてもらった。
わしの道の果ては、此処で良きかな……"
